doc.after: In the organisation of the Conservative Party constituency associations dominate the election of party leaders and the selection of local candidates although some associations have organised open parliamentary primaries while the Conservative Campaign Headquarters CCHQ leads financing organisation of elections and drafting of policy The leader of the parliamentary party forms policy in consultation with his cabinet and administration This decentralised structure is unusual 93
